text: Amizir kam korotiar aghuibarama aghui, dar ganganim aghevim ko pɨghaghevim. Ezɨ golɨn dɨgɨrir bar aghuiba ko, me dagɨar aghuibar ingarizir dɨgɨriba ko, manmaniar ghurghurir dagɨaba pɨn koziba, amizir kamɨn mɨkarzim gizɨfa. Egha a uan dafarimɨn golɨn itarir mam suirazɨ, itarir kamɨn aven bar kurigha mughazir araziba ko, gumazamiziba tintinibar uari bakɨa amir arazir bar mɨzɨrɨzir kuraba, a gizɨfa.
